wikipedia_page.main: Melvin Lintern (born 17 May 1950) is an English former footballer who played one game at inside-forward for Port Vale in May 1967. After a non-playing spell with Carlisle United, he later played non-league football for Stafford Rangers and Hanley Town.

response: * Mel Lintern (born 1950), played for Carlisle United
